content.content: 1. (1) The fee for a commission appointing a licensee under the Law Society Act as a notary public is $145.  O. Reg. 299/92, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 430/20, s. 1. (2) The fee for a commission appointing a person other than a licensee under the Law Society Act as a notary public is $110.  O. Reg. 299/92, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 430/20, s. 1. (3) The fee for a commission reappointing a person other than a licensee under the Law Society Act as a notary public is $75.  O. Reg. 299/92, s. 1 (3); O. Reg. 430/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The fee for a commission appointing a licensee under the Law Society Act as a notary public is $145.  O. Reg. 299/92, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 430/20, s. 1.

(2) The fee for a commission appointing a person other than a licensee under the Law Society Act as a notary public is $110.  O. Reg. 299/92, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 430/20, s. 1.

(3) The fee for a commission reappointing a person other than a licensee under the Law Society Act as a notary public is $75.  O. Reg. 299/92, s. 1 (3); O. Reg. 430/20, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Section 1 does not apply to a commission appointing as a notary public for Ontario a person who is an employee of, (a)  the Government of Canada; (b)  the Government of Ontario; or (c)  a municipality in Ontario where the application for the commission is made upon the request of the head of the municipality.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 831, s. 2.  Français
content.raw_html:
2. Section 1 does not apply to a commission appointing as a notary public for Ontario a person who is an employee of,

(a)  the Government of Canada;

(b)  the Government of Ontario; or

(c)  a municipality in Ontario where the application for the commission is made upon the request of the head of the municipality.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 831, s. 2.

 

Français
